name: tracey pooh
body: It's very nice to have a comments system back!  I was able to find & fix bugs in the theme's reply/nesting setup.  And the new netlify serverless "on demand" setup (leveraging javascript) which is what comments POST to and get processed by, is super nice!

name: tracey pooh
body: replies working smoothly now, even better than the theme I ported from (bug fix)
